Advanced Tab Manager
Effortlessly manage your browser tabs with Advanced Tab Manager, the ultimate tool to keep your browsing experience organized and efficient!

Features:
✅ List All Open Tabs: View all your open tabs in a single, easy-to-navigate list.
✅ Switch Tabs Quickly: Jump to any tab with a single click.
✅ Close Unwanted Tabs: Remove tabs you no longer need directly from the list.
✅ Pin/Unpin Tabs: Keep your important tabs pinned for easy access or unpin them when they are no longer needed.
✅ Custom Scrollbar: Enjoy a sleek, thin scrollbar with rounded corners for a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.

Why Use Advanced Tab Manager?
✅ Improve Productivity: Spend less time searching for tabs and more time focusing on your tasks.
✅ Organized Browsing: Keep your browser neat and tidy by easily managing open tabs.
✅ User-Friendly Design: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface designed for smooth navigation.

How It Works:
✅ Open the Extension: Click on the Advanced Tab Manager icon in your browser toolbar.
✅ Manage Your Tabs: Use the list to switch, close, pin, or unpin tabs with ease.
✅ Stay Organized: Experience a more organized and efficient browsing session.


Download Advanced Tab Manager now and take control of your browser tabs like never before!
